item.title: git… y u do dis
item.dc:creator: astrojansen
item.description: So I’m new to github. And not gonna lie, I feel a little ashamed about it. To me it’s always been one of those things that only the super impressive graduate students know how to use and navigate, but it just never stuck for me. Hence my embarrassingly grey contribution array. Fetching, pushing, pul ...READ MORE...

item.title: Hello, World!
item.dc:creator: astrojansen
item.description: Ah, “Hello World,” the classic opening. Today my mentors and I held Meeting 0, where we introduced ourselves and began sketching our way forward with the development of telescopy. Mainly we brainstormed what to do during the GSoC “Community Bonding Period” and came up with a nice to-do list for me t ...READ MORE...
